verses.verse: When <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H3045>perceived<s%> all that was <S%H6213>done<s%>, <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and put <S%H3847>on<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> with <S%H665>ashes<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H2199>cried<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> and a <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H2201>cry<s%>;

And <S%H935>came<s%> even <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>: for none might <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H3830>clothed<s%> with <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%>.

And in every <S%H4082>province<s%>, <S%H4725>whithersoever<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1697>commandment<s%> and his <S%H1881>decree<s%> <S%H5060>came<s%>, there was <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H60>mourning<s%> among the <S%H3064>Jews<s%>, and <S%H6685>fasting<s%>, and <S%H1065>weeping<s%>, and <S%H4553>wailing<s%>; and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3331>lay<s%> in <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> and <S%H665>ashes<s%>.

¶ So <S%H635>Esther's<s%> <S%H5291>maids<s%> and her <S%H5631>chamberlains<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> it her. Then was the <S%H4436>queen<s%> <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H2342>grieved<s%>; and she <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H899>raiment<s%> to <S%H3847>clothe<s%> <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%>, and to take <S%H5493>away<s%> his <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> from him: but he <S%H6901>received<s%> it not.

Then <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H635>Esther<s%> for <S%H2047>Hatach<s%>, one of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H5631>chamberlains<s%>, whom he had <S%H5975>appointed<s%> to <S%H6440>attend<s%> upon her, and gave him a <S%H6680>commandment<s%> to <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%>, to <S%H3045>know<s%> what it was, and why it was.
So <S%H2047>Hatach<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> unto the <S%H7339>street<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, which was <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>.

And <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> him of all that had <S%H7136>happened<s%> unto him, and of the <S%H6575>sum<s%> of the <S%H3701>money<s%> that <S%H2001>Haman<s%> had <S%H559>promised<s%> to <S%H8254>pay<s%> to the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1595>treasuries<s%> for the <S%H3064>Jews<s%>, to <S%H6>destroy<s%> them.

Also he <S%H5414>gave<s%> him the <S%H6572>copy<s%> of the <S%H3791>writing<s%> of the <S%H1881>decree<s%> that was <S%H5414>given<s%> at <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> them, to <S%H7200>shew<s%> it unto <S%H635>Esther<s%>, and to <S%H5046>declare<s%> it unto her, and to <S%H6680>charge<s%> her that she should go <S%H935>in<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, to make <S%H2603>supplication<s%> unto him, and to make <S%H1245>request<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him for her <S%H5971>people<s%>.
¶ Again <S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H2047>Hatach<s%>, and gave him <S%H6680>commandment<s%> unto <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%>;

All the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H4082>provinces<s%>, do <S%H3045>know<s%>, that whosoever, whether <S%H376>man<s%> or <S%H802>woman<s%>, shall <S%H935>come<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> into the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>, who is not <S%H7121>called<s%>, there is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1881>law<s%> of his to put him to <S%H4191>death<s%>, <S%H905>except<s%> such to whom the <S%H4428>king<s%> shall hold <S%H3447>out<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H8275>sceptre<s%>, that he may <S%H2421>live<s%>: but I have not been <S%H7121>called<s%> to come <S%H935>in<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> these <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

Then <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H559>commanded<s%> to <S%H7725>answer<s%> <S%H635>Esther<s%>, <S%H1819>Think<s%> not with <S%H5315>thyself<s%> that thou shalt <S%H4422>escape<s%> in the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, more than all the <S%H3064>Jews<s%>.

For if thou <S%H2790>altogether<s%> holdest thy <S%H2790>peace<s%> at this <S%H6256>time<s%>, then shall there <S%H7305>enlargement<s%> and <S%H2020>deliverance<s%> <S%H5975>arise<s%> to the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> from <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>; but thou and thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be <S%H6>destroyed<s%>: and who <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> whether thou art <S%H5060>come<s%> to the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> for such a <S%H6256>time<s%> as this?

<S%H3212>Go<s%>, gather <S%H3664>together<s%> all the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that are <S%H4672>present<s%> in <S%H7800>Shushan<s%>, and <S%H6684>fast<s%> ye for me, and neither <S%H398>eat<s%> nor <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, <S%H3915>night<s%> or <S%H3117>day<s%>: I also and my <S%H5291>maidens<s%> will <S%H6684>fast<s%> likewise; and <S%H3651>so<s%> will I <S%H935>go<s%> in unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, which is not according to the <S%H1881>law<s%>: and if I <S%H6>perish<s%>, I <S%H6>perish<s%>.
So <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> went his <S%H5674>way<s%>, and <S%H6213>did<s%> according to all that <S%H635>Esther<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him.
